ThingDef.label: joywire
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that stimulates the brain's pleasure centers. While it dramatically improves a user's mood, the blanket of happiness makes it hard to concentrate on anything real. Joywires are illegal on many worlds, and are known for destroying whole cultures.

ThingDef.label: painstopper
ThingDef.description: A brain implant which inhibits nociception, or pain sensation. While it does allow the user to accomplish more, it turns out pain has a purpose. When you don't feel it, you can get hurt really bad really easily.

ThingDef.label: endoskeleton stimulator
ThingDef.description: A torso implant that stimulates the overall muscles so they can operate at maximum performance.

ThingDef.label: builder AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Capable to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for building. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: farmer AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Capable to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for farming. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: doctor AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Capable to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for doctoring. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: miner AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Capable to communicate with the user brain and act as a guide for mining. Requires brain implants research before installing.

ThingDef.label: diplomat AI
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that contain AI. Able to communicate with the user's brain and act as a guide for diplomacy. Requires brain implants research before installing.
